description: Triphala supports digestion, reduces acidity, and gently detoxifies.
usage: Take 1 teaspoon powder with warm water before bed.
precautions: Avoid during pregnancy; not suitable in diarrhea.

description: Manjistha purifies blood and reduces skin eruptions like acne and pimples.
usage: Take 1–2 teaspoons powder with warm water daily.
precautions: Avoid during pregnancy; may interact with blood thinners.

description: Brahmi calms the mind and helps reduce cravings during alcohol withdrawal.
usage: Take 1–2 tablets or 1 tsp powder with warm milk daily.
precautions: Avoid overdose; use cautiously in low blood pressure.

description: Haridra (Turmeric) relieves nasal allergies and boosts immunity.
usage: Take 1 tsp turmeric milk at night or 500 mg capsule twice daily.
precautions: Avoid excess use in gallbladder obstruction.

description: Brahmi enhances oxygen utilization and reduces altitude-related stress.
usage: Take 1–2 tablets or 1 tsp powder daily with warm water.
precautions: Avoid in hypotension; consult physician for long-term use.

description: Mandur Bhasma increases hemoglobin and reduces fatigue caused by anemia.
usage: Take 125 mg twice daily with honey or ghee.
precautions: Avoid overdose; use only under medical supervision.

description: Vasaka clears respiratory passages and reduces breathlessness.
usage: Take 1 tsp Vasaka leaf juice or decoction twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in pregnancy; monitor with other asthma medications.

description: Triphala eyewash improves vision and relieves eye strain.
usage: Use Triphala decoction to wash eyes once daily.
precautions: Use only sterile preparations; avoid in eye infections.

description: Shallaki reduces spinal inflammation, easing chronic back pain.
usage: Take 1–2 tablets or 500 mg capsule twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in pregnancy; may interact with NSAIDs.

description: Tulsi relieves bronchial congestion, reduces cough, and supports lungs.
usage: Take Tulsi tea twice daily or 1–2 tablets daily.
precautions: Avoid in hypoglycemia; caution with anticoagulants.

description: Aloe Vera soothes burns and promotes skin healing.
usage: Apply fresh Aloe Vera gel on affected skin twice daily.
precautions: Avoid applying on deep infected wounds without medical care.

description: Arjuna strengthens the heart and helps reduce cholesterol levels.
usage: Take Arjuna bark decoction (10 g bark boiled in water) once daily.
precautions: Avoid in low blood pressure; may interact with heart medications.

description: Tulsi boosts immunity and reduces cough and flu symptoms.
usage: Boil 3–5 leaves in tea twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in hypoglycemia; caution with blood thinners.

description: Arjuna improves circulation and supports cardiac health.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp bark powder boiled in water daily.
precautions: Avoid in hypotension; monitor with cardiac medications.

description: Isabgol husk increases fiber intake and relieves constipation.
usage: Mix 1–2 tsp husk in warm water before bedtime.
precautions: Avoid in bowel obstruction; drink sufficient water.

description: Jatamansi calms the nervous system and reduces anxiety.
usage: Take 500 mg capsule or 1 tsp powder with milk at night.
precautions: Avoid overdose; may cause drowsiness.

description: Gudmar reduces sugar cravings and supports blood sugar regulation.
usage: Take 1 capsule or 2 g powder daily after meals.
precautions: Consult physician if on insulin; avoid in pregnancy.

description: Kutaj is effective for diarrhea and dysentery.
usage: Take 1–2 g Kutaj bark powder with water twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in constipation-prone patients.

description: Garlic oil relieves ear pain and infection symptoms.
usage: Warm 2–3 drops garlic oil and apply to ear canal.
precautions: Avoid in ruptured eardrum; consult physician if persistent.

description: Khadir purifies blood and reduces skin inflammation in eczema.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder daily; apply decoction on lesions.
precautions: Avoid in pregnancy; external use should be patch-tested.

description: Triphala Ghrita improves vision and relieves eye strain.
usage: Use 1 tsp with warm milk daily; external eye wash if sterile.
precautions: Avoid in eye infections without medical advice.

description: Giloy reduces fever and boosts immunity.
usage: Take decoction of Giloy stem twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in autoimmune disorders unless supervised.

description: Hadjod promotes bone healing and strength.
usage: Take 5 g stem powder with milk twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in kidney stones due to oxalate content.

description: Sharpunkha supports liver and gallbladder health.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder daily with water.
precautions: Avoid without medical supervision for gallbladder stones.

description: Hing improves digestion and relieves bloating.
usage: Take 1 pinch Hing powder with warm water after meals.
precautions: Avoid in gastric ulcers.

description: Shankha Bhasma reduces acidity and gastric discomfort.
usage: Take 250 mg twice daily with ghee or honey.
precautions: Use only under supervision; avoid overdose.

description: Guduchi lowers uric acid and reduces gout inflammation.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp stem decoction daily.
precautions: Avoid in autoimmune disorders without supervision.

description: Bhringraj nourishes hair and reduces dandruff.
usage: Apply oil to scalp twice weekly; take 1 tsp powder daily.
precautions: Avoid in pregnancy without physician guidance.

description: Brahmi improves focus and relieves stress-related headaches.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp powder with warm milk or tablets daily.
precautions: Avoid overdose; caution in hypotension.

description: Arjuna strengthens the heart and supports cardiovascular function.
usage: Take decoction of bark 1 cup daily.
precautions: Avoid in hypotension; consult cardiologist if on medication.

description: Kalmegh supports liver detox and improves hepatitis recovery.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder daily with warm water.
precautions: Avoid in low blood pressure or weak digestion.

description: Sarpagandha reduces blood pressure and calms the mind.
usage: Take 250 mg root powder at bedtime.
precautions: Avoid in depression; use strictly under medical supervision.

description: Amla rejuvenates tissues and boosts immunity.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp powder or 20 ml juice daily.
precautions: Avoid excess use in diarrhea.

description: Hingvastak Churna improves digestion and reduces bloating.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder with ghee before meals.
precautions: Avoid in gastric ulcers.

description: Kapikacchu improves sperm count and vitality.
usage: Take 3–5 g seed powder with milk daily.
precautions: Avoid in high Pitta disorders.

description: Tagara promotes sound sleep and reduces insomnia.
usage: Take 1 capsule (500 mg) at bedtime with milk.
precautions: Avoid overdose; may cause excessive drowsiness.

description: Ashwagandha reduces joint pain and strengthens bones.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp powder with warm milk daily.
precautions: Avoid during pregnancy; monitor thyroid.

description: Punarnava reduces swelling and supports kidney function.
usage: Take 1 tsp decoction or powder twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in low blood pressure; consult physician.

description: Bhumyamalaki detoxifies the liver and supports jaundice treatment.
usage: Take 5–10 ml fresh juice twice daily.
precautions: Avoid in very weak patients without supervision.

description: Neem detoxifies the blood and clears skin allergies.
usage: Apply neem paste externally and take 1–2 g neem powder daily.
precautions: Avoid in very dry skin; may cause dryness.

description: Chitrak stimulates digestion and improves appetite.
usage: Take 500 mg root powder with warm water before meals.
precautions: Avoid in ulcers and pregnancy.

description: Lodhra regulates menstruation and reduces bleeding issues.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder with honey daily.
precautions: Avoid in constipation and dryness issues.

description: Ajwain relieves gas, indigestion, and stomach pain.
usage: Take 1 tsp roasted ajwain seeds with warm water.
precautions: Avoid in hyperacidity.

description: Swarna Bhasma enhances immunity in children.
usage: Administer under supervision: 30–60 mg with honey weekly.
precautions: Use strictly under medical guidance only.

description: Pippali clears mucus and strengthens lungs.
usage: Take 1–2 g powder with honey daily.
precautions: Avoid in gastritis and high Pitta conditions.

description: Shankhpushpi enhances memory and calms the mind.
usage: Take 1–2 tsp powder with warm milk daily.
precautions: Avoid overdose; may cause drowsiness.

description: Medohar Guggulu supports weight reduction and fat metabolism.
usage: Take 1 tablet twice daily after meals.
precautions: Avoid in pregnancy and thyroid disorders.

description: Mrityunjaya Rasa reduces fever and supports immunity.
usage: Take 125 mg with honey twice daily.
precautions: Strictly under Ayurvedic physician’s supervision.

description: Sitopaladi relieves sinusitis and cough.
usage: Take 1–2 g with honey thrice daily.
precautions: Avoid in diabetes without doctor’s advice.

description: Neem detoxifies the blood and clears skin allergies.
usage: Apply neem paste externally and take 1–2 g neem powder daily.
precautions: Avoid in very dry skin; may cause dryness.
